text: Udivlyayas', chto u neyo roditsya rebonok neobychnym sposobom, Maryam sprosila: "Gospodi! Otkuda budet u menya rebonok, kogda ne kasalsya menya ni odin muzhchina?" Allakh otvetil yey, chto sotvorit yego Svoyeyu moshch'yu, po Svoyemu zhelaniyu. Kogda On pozhelayet chto- nibud', On sotvorit eto Svoim mogushchestvom. Kogda On prisudit byt' chemu-libo, to skazhet tol'ko: "Bud'!" - i ono byvayet
